data.text: Nia madahaanau o di madawaawa Judah ne wanga ginai di baahi di gowaa be di hai deenei:
Tagageinga i bahi i ngaaga o tenua deenei le e daamada i bahi i ngaaga Tai Mmade,
gaa hana gi ngaaga i di Ala Nnoonua o Akrabbim ga hanadu gi di Anggowaa o Zin. E hana laa i bahi i ngaaga o Kadesh Barnea, diiagi Hezron ga hanadu gi nua gi Addar, gaa biga adu gi Karka,
ga hanadu gi Azmon, ga daudali di monowai dela e hai tagageinga o Egypt gaa tugi i di Tai go Mediterranean, di gowaa dela e odi ai tagageinga. Deenei tagageinga dela i bahi i ngaaga o Judah.
Tagageinga i bahi i dua la dela go Tai Mmade, gaa hana loo gi di ngudu di monowai Jordan.

ga hanaga gaa tugi i Beth Hoglah, gaa hana i bahi i ngeia nia gonduu go Beth Arabah ala i hongo di gowaa mehanga gonduu o Jordan, ga hanaga gi nua gi Tadugalaa o Bohan (Bohan la tama daane ni Reuben),

Mai di gowaa mehanga gonduu o di Hagaduadua, tagageinga deenei gaa hana gi Debir, ga hanadu gi ngeia gi Gilgal, dela e huli adu gi di Ala Nnoonua o Adummim i bahi i ngaaga di gowaa baba, ga hanadu gaa tugi nia monowai uwa aga i En Shemesh, gaa hana gi daha gi En Rogel,

gaa hana laa lodo di gowaa mehanga gonduu o Hinnom, e hana taalinga i bahi i ngaaga tama gonduu dela e dugu ai di waahale digau Jebus go Jerusalem. Tagageinga e hana loo e dau i hongo tama gonduu dela i bahi i dai di gowaa mehanga gonduu o Hinnom, dela di gowaa e hagaodi gi ngeia di gowaa mehanga gonduu o Rephaim.
E tugi i golo, gaa hana labelaa gi nia monowai uwa aga i lodo tenua o Nephtoah, gaa hana gaa tugi i nia waahale hoohoo adu gi di Gonduu Ephron. Gaa huli ga hanadu gi Baalah (be go Kiriath Jearim),
gaa biga loo i bahi i dai Baalah ga hanadu gi tenua gonduu o Edom, ga hanadu loo i bahi i ngeia i di Gonduu Jearim (be go Chesalon), ga haneia gi Beth Shemesh, ga hanadu ga diiagi Timnah.

Tagageinga la gaa hana gaa tugi i tama gonduu i bahi i ngeia i Ekron ga hagabiga i golo ga hanadu gi Shikkeron, ga hana laalaa i di Gonduu Baalah, ga hanadu hua igolo gi Jamnia, gaa hana loo gaa tugi i di Tai go Mediterranean,
dela e hai tagageinga i bahi i dai o Judah.

Be di kai a Dimaadua ne hagawaalanga gi Joshua, di baahi di gowaa o Judah guu wanga gi Caleb, tama daane a Jephunneh, mai di madawaawa Judah. Mee gu hai mee gi Hebron, di waahale a Arba, tamana o Anak.
Caleb gu hagabagi nia hagadili o Anak gi daha mo di waahale deelaa, go nia madahaanau a Sheshai, Ahiman mo Talmai.15.14 Gabunga 1.20
Nomuli gei mee ga heebagi gi digau ala e noho i Debir. (Di waahale deenei la nogo haga ingoo boloo Kiriath Sepher.)
Caleb ga helekai, “Au gaa wanga dagu dama ahina go Achsah e hai dono lodo gi tangada dela ma gaa kumi di waahale go Kiriath Sepher.”
Othniel, tama daane Kenaz, go tuaahina o Caleb, gaa kumi di waahale, malaa Caleb gaa wanga dana dama ahina go Achsah gii lodo ginai.

Di laangi dela e hai tagahai lodo, gei Othniel gaa hai gi Achsah gii dangi gi dono damana i di gowaa. Tama ahina gaa doo gi lala mo hongo dana ‘donkey’, gei Caleb ga heeu gi mee be di maa di aha e hiihai gineia.
Tama ahina ga helekai, “Au e hiihai gi nia madapua wai. Di gowaa ne gaamai kooe la di gowaa maangoo.” Malaa, Caleb gaa wanga gi mee nia monowai uwa aga ala i bahi i nua mo i bahi i lala.
Aanei nia gowaa nia madahaanau o di madawaawa Judah ne hai mee ginai:
Nadau waahale ala adu gi baahi ngaaga ala e hoohoo adu gi di geinga o Edom:
Hazor Hadattah, Kerioth Hezron (be go Hazor),
Nia waahale ala i tono nia gonduu:
Gederoth, Beth Dagon, Naamah mo Makkedah.
Ekron mo ono waahale llauehe mo lligi ala i dono baahi,
mo nia waahale llauehe huogodoo ala i di gili o Ashdod, mai i Ekron gaa tugi i di Tai go Mediterranean.
Ashdod mo Gaza, mo nau waahale llauehe mo lligi, gaa tugi i di monowai i di geinga o Egypt, mo tongotai o Mediterranean.
Gei i tenua gonduu o Judah:
Kiriath Baal (be go Kiriath Jearim) mo Rabbah, nia waahale aanei le e lua, mo nia dama waahale i nau daha.
Nibshan, di Waahale Toolo, mo Engedi.
Gei digau Judah gu deemee di hagabagi gi daha digau Jebus ala nogo noho i Jerusalem. Digau Jebus e noho hua igolo ngaadahi mo digau Judah.15.63 Gabunga 1.21; 2 Samuel 5.6; 1 Kronikel 11.4
